Add New User/Group/Host Dialog Box

Requires: NI Distributed System Manager (Windows)

In the Security Settings dialog box, click Add to open this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to configure access rights for a user, group, or host computer.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Add user or group—Specifies whether to configure the access rights for the users and groups in a domain.
    • Domain—Displays the name of the domain.
    • Users and groups—Specifies the users and groups you want to configure access rights for.
  • Add host—Specifies whether to configure the access rights for a host computer.
    • Host—Specifies the host you want to configure access rights for.
